artcles.title: How to create a successful UX case study in 2022 to ace your first interview
artcles.subtitle: Real FAANG Examples
artcles.text: Now you have gotten a few UX projects under your belt, do you feel stressed because you have no idea just exactly how you should structure your case study? Someone might have told you your case studies just don't seem like “real” work experience. Maybe you applied to a few jobs but were rejected because “your UX portfolio isn’t clear or lacks depth”. Perhaps you even landed an interview, but you know it didn’t go well because you stumbled at the very first step of presenting and answering questions on your project.If I coached you a few years ago, I may have thought these were just problems of bad UX writing, uninspiring projects, a lack of solid UX storytelling.
artcles.name: Leon Zhang
